getStarted: Select a navigation item to get started.

homeConfig.intro: To show custom content on the home page:
homeConfig.startUrl: Set start_url in shellui.config to redirect "/" to another path (e.g. start_url: '/playground').
homeConfig.rootNav: Or add a navigation item with path "" or "/" to display that item at "/".

navigationNotAllowed: This URL is not configured in the app navigation.

errorBoundary.descriptionChunk: This can happen after an update or due to a network issue. Try refreshing the page.
errorBoundary.descriptionGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. You can try again or go back.
